author: smohanty
msg: AMBARI-2526. NPE in the ambari log4j when the threads are shutting down. (smohanty)

author: sarowe
msg: SOLR-4897: make add-unknown-fields-to-the-schema the default update.chain for all defined /update request handlers

author: chirino
msg: Improve the replicated leveldb behavior when the number of nodes in the cluster falls below the required minimum.  The master node will switch to electing mode.  The master store startup will now also block until it syncs up with slaves so that we don't accept connections the master is fully online.
